output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the required criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions three presidential candidates: - Elena Lasconi (USR) - George Simion (AUR) - CÄƒlin Georgescu (Independent)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement with 35,000-40,000 impressions - Uses hashtags for wider reach - Published on both Facebook and Instagram
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Uses explicit electoral messaging with "#GeorgeSimionPreÈ™edinte" - Directly influences voting preferences by discrediting one candidate (Lasconi) and promoting another (Simion) - Uses emotional language and national symbols (ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡´) to influence voters
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - Uses emotional language and exclamation marks - No balanced reporting or factual information
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, organized campaign - Uses strategic messaging and campaign hashtags - Clear promotional intent

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes/attacks presidential candidates - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching tens of thousands - Has clear electoral messaging - Uses emotional and persuasive language - Explicitly aims to influence voting preferences
conclusion.message-for-police: AcÈ›iunea.RO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin postarea cu ID 1299186844846991 care constituie propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie, publicata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea reprezinta propaganda electorala prin faptul ca promoveaza explicit candidatul George Simion la presedintie folosind hashtag-ul "#GeorgeSimionPreÈ™edinte", discrediteaza candidata Elena Lasconi, si foloseste un mesaj electoral explicit cu scop de influentare a votului ("RomÃ¢nia meritÄƒ o schimbare REALÄ‚!"). Postarea platita a avut un impact semnificativ, ajungand la 35,000-40,000 de persoane, folosind multiple platforme (Facebook si Instagram) pentru diseminare, cu un buget intre 300-399 RON, reprezentand astfel o incercare clara si sistematica de a influenta votul in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
